course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Disruption of Healthcare
course.description: The course will provide its participants information about how technology, customer expectations and macroeconomic trends are shaping the business and disrupting traditional healthcare industry. Upon the completion of the course, students could gain an overall understanding of healthcare industry and also be able to understand disruption dynamics in healthcare, ways and means of innovation, identify business and technology opportunities and analyze applicability of innovation into various parts of the healthcare industry and how to benefit from them as a business operator.
